text: Blackness. Then a hint of green becomes EARTH. It lies ac expanse of  space. Richly colored. Fertile. A GIGANTIC ASTEROID cuts into frame, Burning into EARTH'S ATMOSPHERE and  striking down in the currant area of Guzu Mexico. Voice An impact equivalent to ten thousand nuclear weapon detonating  simultaneously. A HUGE DINOSAUR FOOT steps down hard and is VAPORIZED wit deafening ROAR. Voice One hundred trillion tons of dirt and rock hurled i atmosphere.  EARTH, seen from space, is rocked with an IMMENSE SHOCKWA SHEET OF DEBRIS  washes across the North and South Hemisp Voice A blanket of dust the sun is powerless to penetrate five thousand  years our world is robbed of light as a nu winter falls. In that darkness,  a civilisation is remove existence. EARTH is now completely entombed in a dark, cold hell. Le push towards us--

head_text.subj: "A R M A G E D D O N"

text: EARTH, reflected off the face of ASTRONAUT PETE SHELBY'S It appears  close enough to touch. Shelby, attached to SH ATLANTIS BY LIFELINE,  struggles to replace a piece of th shuttle's operational arm. Shelby  (with radio squawking) Houston, I can't get this thing to work...

Golden The size of Texas. In a hub of computers and track equipment, we find DAN GOLDEN, former  Astronaut from Apo (first crew to orbit the Moon) and now N.A.S.A's  second-in-command. Golden is watching on a SERIES OF VIDEO SCREENS.  FLIGHT DIRECTOR WALTER CLA with rows of N.A.S.A Techs. Golden stands over  him, arms back o his chair. Clark Atlantis, what's the problem? Shelby  (V.0)

It just isn't working. Any suggestions? Clarke Hang on Pete. We'll figure something out for you. Golden taps Clark and sits down. Golden  (to Shelby) We got the top scientific minds in the world working on (a slight smile) Try "whacking" the thing.  Shelby Okay, Houston, commence whacking. Selby begins Whacking the satellite with his glove. The S comes n-line,  lights up like a Christmas tree. A HORRIFYING RUMBLING SOUND. SHOTGUN LIKE PELLETS assault satellite.  SHRAPNEL rips into it's delicate gold skin. T satellite EXPLODES. Shelby's  lifeline breaks; he spins o leaking from twenty punctures.
COMMANDER JAMES TURNER turns to his left General "WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT?"
STOTGUN LIKE PELLETS shred through Atlantis' N.A.S.A. log peeling the shuttle  down to her ribs. FIERY EXPLOSION.

CLOSE ON SHELBY as he twirls away from Atlantis. His helm fogging. He gasps  for air, wretching, his eyelids leakin He tries to form words Shelby Ple...he...me.... Shelby's SHOULDER-CAM angle spins end-over-end.... INT. N.A.S.A - MISSION CONTROL MONITORS go dead. N.A.S.A. Technician #1 All systems crashing! N.A.S.A. Technician #2 Massive failure. We lost them. Utter silence. Utter desolation. DOLLY IN ON GOLDEN'S FAC disbelief.

THEO and PEARL  (at telescope) , and JIMBO  (at the console) , 20's, are  star-gazing. Astronomy books, Starbucks cups spread all over. Nine Inch  Nails plays on the radio. The could land a date if only they would lose  the road flare (plaid shirts, glasses) that signal the painful fact that they  are die-hard scie nerds THEO'S POV - THROUGH WKU TELESCOPE - Far off in spa dusty, murky swarm of matter - something resembling a FLO EXPLOSION. Jimbo When are we going to let N.A.S.A in on what we've f Theo We don't even know what we have yet. Comet, asteroid could be  anything up there. And don't be so eager to red N.A.S.A. They don't call us  when they discover anything. Jimbo Yeah, but this is their sandbox were playing in. Theo This is our discovery. We're going to hold a press  conference. We're  going to be famous. SPACEWATCH'll name thing after us. Job offers are going  to fly in from all companies. J.P.L., that think tank up at M.I.T., hell  ev N.A.S.A. 'll be chasing us. Pearl I'm going on Oprah, Larry King, Letterman... Jimbo Hell with them, I'm going on Howard Stern.... Pearl  (concentrating) This things really acting up tonight. We should find out anyone else knows about this. Theo How? Jimbo  (master of factly) Call N.A.S.A Theo And say what? "Hi, we're a couple astronomer geeks w something  really bitchin; floatin' in space." You can't call N.A.S.A. It's like  calling the White House. Besides never get the number. Jimbo I have the number. I got it from "Mega monster." Pearl Who? Jimbo He's some super-hacker, I went to high school with. totally wired  into every encrypted government installati Theo He's also an ex-con. Jimbo They never proved he shut down the power in those s states. Theo grabs the phone.

Golden and his crew, devastated and exhausted, search for answers. We cut around  the room. Clark What the hell was that? Technician 1 Space junk? Technician 2 Too big, too much. It took out the whole shu Clark The press is going to want answers. What are we goi say? Golden Nothing. Not until we know what happened.

Two N.A.S.A. techs, FLIP and SKIP, looking very haggard,  furiously typing  numbers into the circulator. The phone Flip answers. Jimbo  (whispers to Pearl & Theo) I got mission control....! Flip Yeah, Mission Control. Jimbo  (into phone) Uhh hi, I'm an astronomer in Kentucky, and I was wonderin you guys had seen some strange activity in the southern m quadrant of  the asteroid belt between Antares Major and Scorpio.... Flip Who is this? Jimbo My name? Uhh....Louis Lipshitz... Flip This is a restricted line. How did you get it? Where you? Jimbo Lexington... Massachusetts. Flip Can you tell me the exact co-ordinates..? Theo Hang up! Hang up now! Jimbo hangs up the phone. Theo Lexington.. uhh...Massachusettes. Idiot. I told you call them.
Establishing. The sun rises over the Brooklyn Bridge.

LITTLE GUY, still yawning, exits an apartment with a Jack terrier on a  long RETRACTABLE LEASH. TERRIER'S POV as th dog attacks the city,  looking for a place to relieve him The Man stops in front of a "Crazy  Eddie's" T.V. store. to-ceiling T.V.'s in the window broadcasting  E.S.P.N.'s Exercise Show" with hot women SWEATING. The Jack Russell strains on the leash to a FIRE HYDRANT. is next to the  hydrant, connected to a HUGE SAMOAN GUY w the pelvic thrusting on T.V.  The dog lifts his leg and p hitting both hydrant and shoe. The huge Samoan  guy kicks dog. The dog YELPS. Little Guy You kick my dog again and I'll go nuclear on y The T.V. images BLINK and STATIC. A massive SONIC BOOM em directly above.  The huge Samoan guy looks up as--- A ROCK, the size of a basketball, strikes him and EXPLODE the pavement,  spewing sparks and concrete, throwing PEDE to the sidewalk.
FIFTY T.V.s are BLOWN across the showroom floor. SALESMEN CUSTOMERS dive to  the floor, SCREAMING.

Little guy, lying on the sidewalk, recovers. His DOG LEAS from the leash  grip into a 10 FOOT CRATER in the sidewal huge Samoan guy's LEGS protrude.  Little Guy Samson? Pedestrian Somebody call 9-1-1! INSIDE THE CRATER - THE JACK RUSSELL dangles by the leash Embedded in the hole  30 feet below is A SMOKING, RED HOT

The U.S.'s Early Warning Air Defence. Two U.S.A.F RADAR  TECHNICIANS are hunched  over radar screens. Radar Tech 1 I got one, two, three boggies...the whole bo lighting up! The RADAR TECH 2 hits a KLAXON, stabs phone line buttons.

Traffic is ground to a halt. CAMERA MOVES into a cab. STU Cabbie, with an  ASIAN TOURIST, who's craning his neck ou window. Asian Tourist What's the problem? Stu Could be a couple o things: shootin',  stabbin', dead guy  (shrugs) Well, it's Friday, payday. Could be a jumper. A projectile the size of a dump truck SCREAMS through the blasts through  three huge buildings. More projectiles explode in the intersection. Cars get th everywhere. Stu's  cab slams upside down into JOHNNY'S BA ONE BLOCK DOWN. THE ENTIRE TOP FIVE STORIES -- A sheared topples and  hits the street below. Bricks, mortar and ga everywhere.
Establishing, over which we hear RINGING PHONES.

Chaos in the corridors. GENERAL TEMPLE, Chairman of the J Chiefs of Staff, a  man of stature, bursts out of his off by his SECRETARY. Secretary We're getting reports as far away as Greenland parts of Mexico! Temple Get me Dan Goldman on the secure phone. Temple enters his office and picks up a secure phone.
Golden enters the room and sits down. Technician Flip han secure phone.  Golden sinks into his chair. In the b.g., MONITORS show twenty live feeds  from T.V. stations acros country. Temple  (V.O.)
Can you go secure? Golden  (presses a button on the phone) I am secure. Go ahead, General. He listens...WE HEAR the distinct gargled voice of a secu Golden When? Temple  (V.O.)
Twelve minutes ago. Now you know what happened to your sh

Temple paces in his office. Temple I'm going to brief the President. What's going on Dan? Why didn't  we have warning? Golden Tell the president it's called "budget cuts." We d have enough  telescopes to track the skies. Temple Is it over? Golden I don't know. We'll figure it out.  (hangs up)

Flip enters the room. Skip writes notes.... Golden  (to Skip and Flip) Fly a team up to New York. Contact every Space Watch  fac in the world. We gotta find what part of the sky this is from. Skip I'll call J.P.L. and get the Hubble telescope on it. Golden Did we find who made the phone call last night? Flip The F.B.I.'s on it.
Theo is sleeping. The door is RAMMED in. Two F.B.I. AGENT into the room,  overwhelming him.
Pearl and Jimbo are walking across campus. TWO BLACK SEDA up. The kids  increase their pace.The sedans SKID to a st F.B.I. AGENTS spring from the  cars, cuff them and CUT TO

Stu's upside down cab, in front of Johnny's. A tow truck dented cars  from the trashed intersection. Career drunks FRED and WILLIE, stand in  the threshold looking out at t devastated intersection. Stu sits on top of his  cab, Lis to the guys Frank This city sucks... Fred What the hell was it? Willie They're sayin' it's space rocks. Stu Rocks from space, my ass. That, my friends, was the w the big  Saddam. That was big-ass Iraqi missiles

F.B.I. AGENTS and N.A.S.A. SCIENTISTS examine a CHUNK OF  ASTEROID, still  smouldering, which has ripped through th and floor of a subway car. The  plastic seats and alumini panelling of the car has melted.

Jimbo, Theo and Pearl sit in front of three F.B.I. AGENTS N.A.S.A.  ASTRONOMERS look over the kids' TELESCOPE PHOTO concern. Jimbo So, that N.A.S.A. guy wasn't kiddin; about bein' ar and.... Federal Agent Please shut up. Jimbo Yes, absolutely, yes sir. N.A.S.A. Astronomer I'm a N.A.S.A. astronomer. When were photos taken? Federal Agent And which of you called N.A.S.A. Mission Co last night? Jimbo  (points at Theo) Him. Theo  (points at Jimbo) Him. Jimbo I was calling the Houston area code, which is 713. calling 712,  which is outside Spokane, Washington, where Zelda.... N.A.S.A. Astronomer Tell us the exact ascension angle of telescope when  this was taken. Theo It's our discovery. No way. N.A.S.A. Astronomer Your "discovery" killed close to 100 in New York  alone - people who could've used a warning. Jimbo, Theo and Pearl lower their eyes. Jimbo Our math must've been off! we thought it was gonna Earth! Pearl Ascension 712, retention 345. F.B.I. Agent 2 And you've told no one about this- not you teachers, not your  friends? N.A.S.A. Astronomer  (into cellular phone) J.P.L., please. Search  co-ordinates...

N.A.S.A.'s Jet Propulsion Laboratory home of the HUBBLE S TELESCOPE. Two  J.P.L. TECHNICIANS man the Hubble's contr console.  J.P.L. Technician 1 New info! Plot co-ordinates 712 by 34 move on  high-resolution imaging. J.P.L. TECHNICIAN 2 pun co-ordinates into a control console.
(DAY)
The HUBBLE SPACE TELESCOPE floats by in geosynchronous or telescope  tilts, repositioning in view.

Images from the Hubble arrive on a high resolution printe J.P.L. Technician 1  grabs four PHOTOS from the printer.  Technician 2 swipes stuff off the console,  making room. they arrange the four photos. They star silently at the COMPOSITE PHOTO. J.P.L. Technician 1 Motherfu......

Golden and all his TECHNICIANS crowd around a console, st a smaller  version of the COMPOSITE PHOTO. Golden Copies to the Pentagon, Colorado Space Command, an Washington  office. We gotta compute size, composition, s impact point WE SEE the photo -- A HUGE ASTEROID
CAMERA PUSHES THROUGH A CLOUD OF ROCKY, ICY DEBEIS, penet the cloud until  the HUGE ASTEROID CORE comes into clear a mass of dirt and ice -- rough,  craggy, menacing. INT.

Golden and Clark enter. A group of ten N.A.S.A. SENIOR  TECHNICIANS are all  talking at once. Golden Okay guys, one of the worst days in N.A..S.A histo got worse.  Ten million to one. A rogue comet came from d space and collided with an  asteroid. Some  kids actually picture of the collision event and told no one.  The stuf hit this morning was the collision's forward-thrown matte pebbles from what's  about to come. Walter?  Clark A big asteroid. E.T.A., eighteen days. A lot bigger the five mile  one that obliterated the dinosaurs. Silence. Everybody stares at each other. The phone CHIRPS. Golden's Secretary Director, the Pentagon. Golden hits a button. A LARGE T.V. SCREEN establishes AUDIO/VISUAL link.
Temple sits with the Joint Chiefs, White House Chief of S the Directors of  the N.A.S.A., C.I.A., etc. Temple Dan, we're all here. Tell us what we're up against Golden  (V.O.)

In it's simplest terms? The end of Mankind. One asteroid, mile wide or bigger, impacts the Earth with the equivalen of all the  nuclear weapons in the  world, times a thousa our population will die within 24  hours from tidal waves heat pulses. The other half won't be so lucky. In the  en will be men  eating the flesh of other men.  (beat) It's not the end of the  world, General, the world - Eart will still be here. But there will be no  life - maybe  cockroaches and  some resilient strands of bacteria.  Temple Well, that's really positive, Dan. The President j off the phone  with the Russians. They're just about to l new Mars Probe on the biggest  rocket in the world.  Gold the N.A.S.A. BRASS exchange sceptical looks. Golden  (V.O)

With the worst guidance system in the world. Their Mars P '96 was found by a pygmy tribe in Africa.  Temple They're going to pull off the probe and replace it four Atlas  Class IV nuclear warheads. Enough punch in th opinion - not to break it up -  but to slow it down enoug miss Earth's orbit.  Golden  (V.O)
Their launch date is set for next month. Temple They're going to move it up. Golden  (V.O)
To when? Temple Sixteen hours from now. All the N.A.S.A. Technicians CLAMOR at once. Golden  (V.O)

What are they gonna do, glue, spit, and scotch tape it to Even if they get a nuke out to the asteroid, a surface nu detonation is not  going to work.  The only way is to spl thing in half and hope the two pieces  slide past us.  Temple Thank you for bringing up the impossible, Dan. Colinswood People, the President's joining us, Mr. Presid President  (V.O)
Well, this has been a tough day. The media's all over thi They're going to get nothing. Telling the public we might dead in  eighteen days achieves nothing but panic.  Golden  (V.O)

Mr President, finding this speck in the sky is a very har to do unless you have the exact co-ordinates. There are o twelve telescopes  powerful enough  to see it right now. got a full moon goin' for four days -  makes it all but  impossible to see.. Once these things draw closer to Eart you'll never keep a lid on  this. No way.

The video screen blinks off. Golden looks at his Techs. Golden How many of you are as scared as I am? Golden raises his hand. All the other N.A.S.A. Techs, one raise their  hands. Golden One giant leap for Mankind. Everyone remember that is what we are  going to do. We're going to fly to that a with a nuclear device, implant  it and get off  before it Quincy?  All eyes turn to N.A.S.A. Chief of R&D, RONALD QUINCY. Qu coke bottle  glasses and a 198 I.Q. Quincy Look: set a fire cracker off in your open palm, yo third degree  burn. Close your fist, It'll do some seriou damage. If we can get a nuke deep  in one of the asteroid lines, she'll split in two, like a diamond.  Golden You're all looking art us like we're crazy. We're Skip Dan, our currant shuttle fleet is too old and too sl Golden What I'm going to tell you is a breach of national security and could  land me in jail, but in eighteen days arnt' gonna be any jails,  so....We're not gonna use a  c shuttle. Gentlemen, I'm talking about the X-71.  Skip It's done? Quincy Has been for three months.
N.A.S.A.'s flight testing facility. A flat, hard, dry are dominated by an  ENORMOUS HANGER. The HANGER DOOR is open blows back a BLACK SILK  TARPAULIN, revealing the X-71's Technicians come and go.

Golden Time is our enemy. This is like the race to the Mo - what this  Agency was founded on. Skip Boss, we're good at space travel, but you're talkin' drilling a  hole. Golden Quincy's been working on excavating the ice from t - he's gonna  reorient his thinking. Right, Quince? Quincy Right. And the first thing I'm gonna do is talk to I ripped  off. His name is Harry S. Stamper. He's the bes driller in the world.  Golden I don't care who he is, what he's doing.

Close on a GOLF BALL. THWACK! The golf ball EXPLODES off from an oil  rig. The "TROLL" is the largest man-made str in the world - 12 aircraft  carriers big and 1200 feet ta self-contained city.  HARRY STAMPER, world's foremost expert on offshore deep d immaculately  attired in golf attire and spikes, stands o patch of Astroturf with a five  iron in his hand. Piped-i drown out the rig noise.
The main drilling platform. On "A" derrick, Chief Driller FROST, 30,  handsome, is at the controls. Roughnecks "JIM
LOGAN, handle 20 foot sections of PIPE  DRILLING SRTRING

Roughneck BENNIE MORGAN, late 20's an ox of a man, comes the platform,  pulling an oily green coveralls and donnin hard-hat. Bennie examines the  rig's DOWNHOLE PRESSURE GA Bennie Chick! take a look at this! Chick Pressure's been up all morning. She kicked twice on A.J.'s eyes move to a TALL BLOND MAN on his lunch break a the rig. A.J. What did our always-at-lunch-Swedish geologist say? Bennie Jah, jah, jah. No bleeper. Too much pressure. Chick You askin' the old man? A.J. nods and walks off.

Harry HITS another ball. WE REVEAL his target, a GREENPEA anchored off  the rig. The BALL strikes the side of the b just missing the head of ONE of  the PROTESTERS. Harry Almost caught that little bastard. He admires his shot as his daughter, GRACE, walks up. Gra late 20's,  business dress, Harvard Law. Grace Having fun? Harry HITS another ball. It misses the boat, skips across water. Grace Sure sliced the shit outta that one.  (frowns) Harry Watch your language, Gracie. Grace Seagulls swallow those and they die. Harry Stupid birds. Harry's EYES move to a GROUP OF GREENPEACE PROTESTERS acr rig, being held  back by Stamper Oil SECURITY GUARDS.  Grace I just talked with A.J. Harry Talking to him quite a bit these days.... Grace  (awkward pause) "A" rig's acting up. The drill string kicked twice this   morning, gave Chick a nasty bruise in the head. Harry Good. He's not vulnerable there. Grace Chase Manhatten okayed the bridge financing for the Micronesia Project,  but at 21 percent interest. And Lloy London refuses to underwrite the  Venezuela> Project.... Harry Thieves and cowards, all of 'em. Twist their arms. Grace I am. Harry Keep twisting. Like a pit bull. Grace Oh, and that magazine article - they want some huma interest stuff -  likes and dislikes. "Likes" I said Golf Fishing, Single Malt Scotch, Old  Movies. What about  "Di Harry Any kind of flying and oil company executives. Go d 'em. I  always look better when you're doing the talking. Harry HITS another ball. CLANG. Grace You know you donate 300 grand a year to Greenpeace. Harry smiles at the contradiction. Harry What'd your mother call me? Grace Complicated. Harry Yeah well....I'm complicated. Grace walks off, passing A.J., winking at him. A.J. winks A.J. What's his mood? Grace Complicated. A.J. walks up to Harry. Harry I understand we're having problems with "A" rig. A.J. I'm on top of it  (Harry picks up his bag) Harry, you have a second? Harry Yeah. One. A.J. I'll hurry. I've worked for you for a long time. Harry Twelve years. A.J. And you've been real good to me.... Harry Another company make you an offer, kid? A.J. No. The reason I am here, today, standing here, talk you. I'm  obviously talking to you...but it's, you know, uhh...it's not an  oil-related matter exactly.... Harry You're sweating, A.J. A.J. You know there comes a time in a man's life when... (to himself) No,  that's a cliche... (to Harry) Can I start again? I, uhh, fell...I've fallen... Harry You hurt yourself? A.J. In love, I mean. Fallen in love. It's the damnedest but this  person you...know...really well. ACROSS THE PLATFORM - Grace escorts five angry OIL INDUST EXECUTIVES over to  Harry. A KLAXON SOUNDS. Harry, alarme rushes right past them, toward the "A"  Derrick. They fol snapping at his heels Oil Executive 1 You explicitly promised results at 25 tho feet. Harry We have results. Oil Executive 2 But we don't have oil. We've given you ev you've  asked.... Harry Horseshit. What the...? Chick! Bennie! Somebody bet me why the  hell "A" derrick is not turning! Chick hurries up to Harry. Chick The uhh....the Greenpeace guys. Harry approaches "A" Derrick. Five MEMBERS of Greenpeace handcuffed  themselves in a circle around the drilling pi Harry Hey there, what can I do for you? Greenpeace Leader This is an official protest. Harry 'Course it is. I love you guys. You like dolphins a whales, I like 'em  too. Hey, I know you. You too. Didn't have shorter hair? Greenpeace Leader Stamper, do you know what this thing do the eco-system? Harry How'd you get out here? Canoe? Rowboat? Oh, that bo there with a  thousand horsepower diesel! Greenpeace Leader How can you wake up every day and look yourself in the  mirror? Harry The same way you did when you blow-dried your hair morning. And you  used a curling iron, I betcha. Did you most electricity's from burning oil?  I'' stop drillin' w world - stops usin' it. Bennie, start 'er up!  Greenpeace Leader Wait........ Harry Can't wait! I'm a businessman! Those goons over the me 57 mil. to  find oil and they ain't leavin' till I do! they have no lives!  The drill string begins to turn in the hole. Greenpeace Leader We....we threw away the key. Harry Sorry. Time is money. BENNIE! The MASSIVE HYDRAULIC KELLY begins to descend on the Gree Activists'  heads. Greenpeace Leader STOP!!!! Harry Bennie! Third gear! The Greenpeace Leader miraculously produces a key and fra begins  unlocking the handcuffs. Grace turns to the oil executives. Grace He's good at public relations. A.J. approaches Grace; they watch Harry. Grace So?  (A.J. stares at her) What?  (no response) What?  (no response)

Suddenly, across "A" Derrick, a KLAXON SOUNDS. Chick She's kickin'! The civilians get the hell away. Harry and A.J. run toward the rig. Chick Pressure's north of seven thousand! A.J. We gotta clear the Derrick! Harry  (looks at wellhead) Chick, rig up another pipe.  (Chick and Bennie look  at Harry with uncertainty)

CHick and Bennie begin clamping, and tong a PIPE STRAND o DRILL STRING  like an INDY PIT STOP CREW. A.J. Harry, we've hit pressure. We gotta bleed it off. e deeper, we'll  blow the rig. Harry Thanks for that opinion. Chick, full speed! A.J. The bit's five thousand feet down! Full speed'll rip pipe apart! Harry You learn all this in college? I been doing this th years, kid. Get  on the controls. A.J. moves reluctantly to the DRILLING CONTROLS. Chick no A.J., who engages  the gears. The PIPE STRING turns at FU SPEED. The new drill pipe descends ten  feet into the hol then.... The torque rips the NEWLY ATTACHED PIPE from the drilling The drill  spins freely. A.J. hits the "stop! lever and stares at Harry. The roughnecks converge around the wellhead. A.J. I'm goin' down. Reattach it. Gimme a wrench and a ba coupling. Chick hand the items to A.J. A.J. descends into the drilling hole.

A.J., holding his breath under water, shimmies down the d pipe  feet-first, inside the water-filled concrete tube r from the rig to the  ocean floor.  A.J. begins wrestling the disconnected sections together.

The wellhead KICKS. The rig platform shakes and shudders. SEAWATER erupts from  the wellhead. Chick The drill hole's flooding! Grace A.J.!! Harry strips off his jacket and climbs into the wellhead. takes a huge breath  and disappears into the brine-filled drilling hole.

A.J. is pinned against the hole wall by one of the discon pipes. Harry  comes down the hole. He plants his back aga hole wall and kicks the  pipe, freeing A.J. A slow, deep, emanates from below. The Briny water  inside the hole sud turns BLACK and VISCOUS.  A.J. and Harry exchange an alarmed look. Harry, then A.J. for the surface,  up the drilling hole as --

-- the wellhead KICKS again. The rig platform SHUDDERS vi The derrick  sways. SEAWATER SPEWS up from the wellhead.  Chick Get back, she's gonna blow! Grace, Chick, Bennie and the other Roughnecks huddle arou flooded drilling  hole, waiting. Tense, agonising seconds Harry scrambles out, covered in....CRUDE OIL. He grabs Grace and pulls her away. Grace Where's A.J.!!!? Harry RIGHT BEHIND ME! RUN! The platform SHAKES. Harry, Grace, and the others sprint

A GEYSER OF CRUDE OIL erupts from the drilling hole, blow out of the  hole fifteen feet above the wellhead. A.J. cr the platform floor.  CRUDE OIL rains down on Grace and the Roughnecks...they r A.J. Grace Never do that again! CLOSE ON A.J. - he's looking back at the DRILL HOLE, pant traumatised,  greasy oil raining on his head. A.J. You know how I told you there were two obstacles? I do the  first,'cause he's tough...but I did the second... (pulls out case; opens it) I  got it at uhm..Tiffany's. I can't give it to you until to him, but try it on.  She reaches for the ring. It slips from A.J.'s hand and f through the grated  floor, pinging off the rig's steel py 100 feet into the sea below.  Grace Don't worry! Tiffany's insures up to a week from pu A.J. stares despondently over the railing. Harry, black with crude oil, staggers past A.J.
(pointedly) Good plan, Harry. Harry  (walks over to Oil Execs) There's your oil, gentlemen. Now get the hell  off my rig

Golden, Clark, Skip, Flip and the rest of the Mission Con Technicians watch  a live feed from Russia. A RUSSIAN ENE SUPER BOOSTER ROCKET sits on its  launch platform.  Flip Look it that sucker. They got a nuke up there in six hours? Skip It'll never fly. Never. Clark Three things the Russians make well, guys - vodka, and rockets.  Don't count 'em out. Golden It's the late 20th century, I run the U.S. Space P and I'm  praying to God the Russians are better at this t are....

The ground begins to SHAKE uncontrollably. EXHAUST billow from the Rocket's  BOOSTERS. The Russian rocket blasts of lifts into....  Something's wrong. The Rocket stops accelerating and stan for a moment.  It falls to Earth; BLOWING UP in a thunder inferno.

(he looks them in the eye) If you're not up to it,  then walkout of that door.  Finally. Theo and Pearl, frustrated, go to the TWO-WAY MI blocking Jimbo  from view. Theo I'm hungry! When're we gonna eat? Pearl I have p.m.s.!! I need some ibuprofen! Jimbo grabs Randy's legal pad and writes:
Randy stares at the message. Randy Okay, I'm done here! The door opens. Two F.B.I. AGENTS lead Randy out. Jimbo l Theo and Pearl. Jimbo He flunked the bar three times.

-- Harry shows Quincy his DRAWINGS of the DRILLING ARM - Harry wants it. -- Harry, A.J. and Quincy work with the TURBO PROP ENGINE transforming it into  a JET FUEL GENERATOR. Quincy We'll run your liquid oxygen from the shuttle thro tube into the  intake manifold. No problem. A.J. I figured out how to bring up the slag. Direct the j turbine's exhaust  down the drill pipe. It'll blow the st right up the hole.  Harry Good, A.J. Good. -- Chick, Bennie, Bear, Jumbo welding new pieces of the D ARM together.  The Roughnecks have changed. Chick and Ben have crew-cuts.  -- A.J., Harry, Max and Tito build the drilling arm.

TWO X-71 SHUTTLES in the hanger. TECHNICIANS scramble aro preparing the  shuttles for the mission. Harry  (points) From all of your intel, the deepest fault line is here. T my sweet spot. If I can get a clean hole in there, She'll half....  Golden ....and the two pieces will slide right past us. Y cannot shatter it.  Getting hit with 20 smaller asteroids bad as one big one. You have to  drill, plant the nuke, off, and detonate -- all before the asteroid reaches this position.  (demonstrates position) You have eight hours. Remember it. You must  detonate by point or,  the two halves will hit us.  Harry nods and walks off. Sharp Drill an eight-hundred foot hole in eight hours? Is possible? Harry doesn't like to be questioned -- Harry You just worry about getting me on that rock, Colon me worry  about the drilling. A moment of conflict between them.

ONE OF THE ARMADILLOS, complete with drilling arm, sits a bottom of the  tank. Harry and six Roughnecks are already bottom, in pressure suits and  helmets.  Golden, Quincy, Clark, Sharp, Truman, and all of the N.A. BRASS, observe. A.J. is the last to enter the tank.

A.J. descend to the tank's bottom. Harry, Chick, Bennie, Tito are in  bulky white pressure suits. Jimbo and Bear w largest pressure suits ever  made. They talk through thei radio links.  One drilling arm starts turning. The Roughnecks turn towa STACK OF 20 FOOT  LONG STAINLESS STEEL DRILLING PIPES on tank's bottom. ABOVE WATER - SIDE OF  TRAINING TANK Golden hits a stopwatch. Golden  (into intercom) Go.

Bear and Jimbo grab a pipe string and handle onto the moc drill arm. They  clamp it on. Bennie and Chick screw a dr onto the pipe string. They are  good, very good. The work the manic intensity of a pit crew at Indy.  Harry Done!
Golden hits his stopwatch. Smiles. The N.A.S.A. Brass is  impressed. Golden These guys are fast. Harry, interior gauge check.

Harry We're on A.J. A.J. Let's see what this baby can do. Harry and A.J. move the Armadillo's AIRLOCK DOOR. It has exterior open/close  button. Harry punches it. The side d opens. Harry enters, then A.J.

Harry and A.J., still underwater, climb inside. Harry pre PRESSURIZATION  button. Simulating pressurisation in spac water in the cab is blown out,  and air WHOOSHES IN.  Harry and A.J. sit dripping in the watertight cab. Throug front window WE  SEE the other Roughnecks in the tank. Ha unlocks his neck seals. Pulls off  his helmet.  Harry Lose the helmet, A.J. A.J. snaps out of it. His hands go instinctively to the h and in one  motion...CLICK. It's off. Harry  (clicks radio) We're in. Run the simulation. The interior PRESSURE GUGE NEEDLES and MONITORS  (engine torque, drill direction,  etc.) start bobbing. The drill starts to cut into a BLOCK OF CO Golden  (V.O)
How's she look? Harry Torque adjuster's good. Fuel level good. A.J., down pressure? A.J. We can do better. I'm increasing the RPM's to seven  thousand. We can get  more torque. Golden  (V.O)
Negative, A.J. Don't exceed ix thousand. Not on this run. A.J. Relax. I built this thing. She's got more in her. In the RPM's. Golden  (V.O)
Negative, A.J. A.J. increases the RPM's. The gauge starts rise. The N.A.S.A. Brass shifts  uneasily in their seats. not accoutomed to seeing their astronauts  disobey orders Golden  (V.0)

(cont'd) A.J., shut the Armadillo down now A.J. We can push it, further. Let's see what she can do. Suddenly, the RPM''s shoot into the red. A red siren spin control room.  The Armadillo SHAKES violently. The DRILLI grinds to nothing. The  Armadillo BLOWS a tranny.  Harry's eyes close. He's pissed.
The N.A.S.A. Brass looks to Golden. One of them shakes th head. Sharp and  Golden exchange a look. Sharp shakes his
A.J. presses a button and the cabin, simulating  "depressurisation" in space,  begins to fill with water.
Everyone around him just watches, as A.J. climbs out of t After a  minute, A.J. looks up, sees all the eyes in the him.

Harry is outside, smoking a Coheba. Harry runs his hand o SMALL METAL MEDAL  that hangs from his neck. Golden appro Golden A.J.'s off the team. We need a list of names from fill the slot. Harry A.J. would be the first name on my list. Golden We don't want independent thinkers. And we don't n heroes. We need a  team. Harry You have to have confidence in the men you send up. understand that.  But I'm the one that has to land on tha Not you.  (firm) I pick my own  team.  Golden One shot. Pull him in line or send him home.

A.J. and Grace are there talking. Grace is on A.J.'s lap. A.J. I pushed it, I screwed up. Grace These astronauts train for years for what you're tr for in a few  days. A.J. I don't know why I didn't just listen to them. Grace So, tomorrow you listen. A.J. and Grace share a look. A.J. I love you, Grace. A N.A.S.A. Tech approaches. N.A.S.A. Technician Harry wants to see you.

Harry and A.J. stand in the centre of a high-tech supply SPARE PARTS from  shuttles, PROTOTYPES and WORK TOOLS are everywhere.  Harry You tell me what the hell you think you're doing? A.J. I'm trying to work with the team. Harry Bullshit. You're trying to lead this team. You're t be me.  You're not me. A.J. What do you want? You want me to quit? Harry If you can't bury this cowboy shit, yeah, I want yo quit. A.J. I don't have to prove anything to anybody, Harry. Harry I listen to N.A.S.A., you listen to me. That's the Either you  follow it, or you're done. A.J. I'll follow it. Harry I stood up for you, because I've made a life of pro people wrong. Harry's hand slides down to the medal hanging from his ne Harry  (cont'd) When I was about your age, I was in Galveston, Texas. I s together some money, bought some old equipment, a little set up a rig  and drilled my first hole. Then I sat there watched her soak up the sun for six  months - waiting for baby to pop. Everybody told me to quit. I wouldn't  liste wife ran off with a drill-rigger, left me with Grace. Eve in town thought I  was a fool. But I stayed with it. And last hour of the last day, she  popped. She spit out that gold and I danced in it like a wild Indian.  (reflective ) I  captured the magic  (holding medal) This is the last piece of pipe that struck  gold that day Harry takes off the medal. Sets it on the table. He grabs cutting vice and  cuts the medal in two perfect halves. H one half to A.J.  Harry  (cont'd) Here, take it up there.

Inside the neutral buoyancy tank -- Harry's crew goes thr DRILLS one  final time  (final mission checks) in quick succession. Everything runs  perfectly. The Arma is rebuilt and shown functioning without error. A.J.  wor part of the team.

The hour of the mission. The two teams sit in the orange flight  pressure suits. Golden enters and stands before t Golden In the book of Revalations, the Bible speaks of a day on Earth,  when all mankind shall perish, shall cease exist. This day is known as  Armageddon.  (firm) Right  now, that day conflicts with six billion schedules (beat) For the  first time in the history of this planet, s spec possesses the technology to  prevent it's own  extinction (beat) I've been with N.A.S.A. my entire adult life.  Eleven yea an astronaut, another fifteen on the ground at Mission Co Twenty-six years I've had  to answer one question -- why? more money? Why the race for  space? Why do we need to kn is up there?  (beat) When we come through  this, I'll take  comfort in the fac I won't ever have to answer those  questions again. You a warriors up there. You are our last hope. God be  with yo The crew stands......

Two sleek BLACK LEAR JETS are parked on the runway. Harry them. Grace  approaches. Harry You know I was thinking, Gracie. Over the years, I have patted  you on the back more.... Grace Dad, you don't need -- Harry No father has ever been prouder of his child, Graci want you to know  that. Grace's reaction makes it clear that Harry has never said anything like this  before. Grace I love you, Dad. Harry I love you too, Gracie. Grace  (as they hug) Keep an eye on A.J. for me. Harry climbs up the metal stairs -- A.J. and the rest of Harry's crew comes out of the buildi moves to Grace  as she watches her father disappear into A.J. Excuse me.  (Grace turns) You're really insanely gorgeous and I was jost  sort of  wondering if you --  Grace I'm engaged. But my father hasn't given him his ble you might  still have a chance.  (smiles, then serious) Promise me you won't do anything  stupid up there. A.J. nods. They kiss passionately. Harry's crew sees this applauds. Grace  blushes, embarrassed. A.J. I love you, Grace. Grace I love you. Come back, Okay? Harry's crew boards LEAR JET 2. A.J. starts toward LEAR J Grace watches him  walk away, eyeing his suit. Grace A.J.--
(turning) Yeah? Grace When you get back, ask them if you can kep the suit (winks) It's kind of  sexy.
The cone-shaped noses of the two X-71's are towering silh against the  sun. Massive CRAWLERS move the shuttles to t launch tower.

Seen from a distance as silhouettes behind a sun-soaked s sixteen figures  walk toward us. As they grow closer, WE intense game faces of Harry,  A.J., Bennie, Chick, Jumbo, Rockhound, Max and others approaching the  launch site. T like N.A.S.A.'s version of the "Dirty Dozen."  Harry carries a LARGE MYSTERIOUS METAL CASE, that we've n before now.

Harry exits the elevator and start to walk to the CATWAL Freedom shuttle.  Harry carries his suitcase. N.A.S.A. Tech 1 Sir, was that case authorised for transpo N.A.S.A. Tech 2 Our weight to fuel ratio's calibrated to kilogram, sir.  How much does that weigh? Harry Sixty pounds. N.A.S.A. Tech 1 That can't go up with you, sir. Harry Wait here.

Harry enters the cabin. N.A.S.A.'s crack seven-member "St Team" goes to  work. Harry's crew are outfitted with thei HELMETS and CHUTE PACKS. Each step  is methodical, each p equipment is checked and rechecked.  Harry Hey you. Yeah you. Come here. A YOUNG N.A.S.A. TECH approaches. Harry gestures at a row METAL COMPONENTS  housed in the wall. Harry What's all this crap? N.A.S.A. Technician  (pointing to various) Multi-track C.D. player.  Anti-gravity hand washer, utens washer, and micro-wave oven.  (proud) We worked  hard to make the X-71 feel  more like home.  Harry just looks at the kid.

Metal components one after the other come out of the shut hatchway and SLAM  into a heap on the lake bed. Harry the appears in the hatchway.  Harry We don't need music and we don't mind dirty utensil Harry picks up his LARGE METAL CASE and ducks back inside Freedom. The  N.A.S.A Techs stare at the ruined component their feet.
Golden and Clark prepare for the launch. N.A.S.A. Tech  (into intercom) T-minus six minutes and counting.
Sharp and Watts settle in. MAJORS PITTS and FISK, two ste demolition  experts, finish tying down their equipment. Mission Control  (V.O)
Roger, Independence and Freedom, auto ground launch  sequ commencing. Sharp looks at Pitts and Fisk Sharp You two ready? Pitts  (enthusiastically)
Golden, Clark and the N.A.S.A. Techs study the CENTRAL BO final  preparations for take-off commence. Technician Shuttles Freedom and Independence you are clea lift off.

The ground TREMBLES like an earthquake. EXHAUST BILLOWS o the ROCKET  BOOSTERS, filling frame. Shuttles Freedom and Independence ROCKET OFF from dual launch pads, STREAKING CAMERA, climbing to the heavens.
Sharp and Watts flip switches, check gauges. Sharp Instituting roll manoeuvre. We have S.R.B. Sep, ove
Technician You are a 'go' for ET separation.
Freedom and Independence scream away from Earth, dropping booster  canisters.
Harry, Chick and the others experience their first G-Forc
Clark Lookin' real good, Freedom. Golden When you meet the Russian, you might want to go ea the guy. He  just broke the record for the longest solo - thirteen months, seven days.
Chick  (to Harry) Thirteen months, seven days.  (beat) What the hell has he been  doing all by himself?

Life inside, like the cluttered glove-box of an old car. Michael's  "Freedom" plays on a piped-in sound system. CO LEV ANDROPOV dances and  sings.  Lev FREEDOM! FREEDOM! GOT TO GIVE WHAT IT TAKES....Hello I love you  America.  (reading from English book) Would you prefer an appetiser or aperitif?

PULL OUT of the MIR's window to see Lev dancing with joy. celebrating the  forthcoming arrival. PULL FURTHER BACK to catch a wider view of the Russian mu module Space  Station -- a white winged steel seagull.
Through the cockpit window, the BLUENESS of Earth's atmos becomes the  BLACKNESS of space.
Clark Freedom, Independence. You're looking good. Prepare start docking  procedures at the MIR.

Sharp addresses the crews of both shuttles over the radio Sharp Listen up -- the MIR will be spinning to give us gr we can work  faster. You might feel queasy or dizzy. We'l transfer the fuel, then  detach from the MIR.  Fast and s This stuff is very volatile.

Lev is working feverishly, running highly insulated liqui and hydrogen  PROPELLANT TRANSFER HOSES from the MIR's se LABORATORY and LIVING MODULES  to the MIR's twin docking A BLUE INDICATOR LIGHT FLASHES. Lev looks out of the MIR' portside window. His  eyes light up. He smiles.
Freedom and Independence approach the MIR station. The MI shaped, with  TWIN DOCKING PORTS at each end of the T's c Freedom begins docking at  one end., Independence at the
Truman Fuel teams prepare to unload.
(unsafe) turns GREEN  (safe) . The docking port's HATCHWHEEL spins,  and the door slid Harry, Sharp, Watts, Chick, A.J., Bennie, and Truman  ent
The TEAM comes through the docking module and out pops Le hanging upside down  in frame. Lev HELLO YANKEES! Welcome to the home of me, Cosmonaut L Andropov.  (MORE)
On a wall, A COMPUTER BOARD that monitors the fuel transf filled with GREEN  LIGHTS.

Harry, Bennie, and Lev are talking in the combination kit rec room of the  MIR -- a little bigger than a walk-in cl Lev grabs a VIDEO CAMERA and  starts video-taping Harry a Bennie.  Lev I hear rumour on radio. My country broke. No steaks i freezer. They plan  to sell me and the MIR  (moving in closer, conspiratorial) Can you confirm this?  Bennie We wouldn't know. What's the camera? Lev Oh, I also di-rec-tor. Russian cinema. MIR movies. Ea title. Lev grabs remote control. On a large TELEVISION screen VA IMAGES OF LEV  appear. Lev "Lev loves cargo." "Lev sleeps." "Lev prepares for  Americans." "Lev gets  bored so he gets drunk." Funny but long.  Bennie Looks like you have a lot of free time on your han Lev Yeah. I alone by myself. Watts comes into the room. The first woman Lev has seen i very, very long  time. Lev moves the camera all over her. Lev Hello, fellow space colleague. Watts nods. Watts I'll be in the docking port. Lev Please allow me to escort you.  (as they walk out) You California girl?

Harry and Bennie enter the MIR's rearmost module. Two pro hoses run into  TWIN PROPELLANT OUTPUT VALVES on a rear p Bennie's eyes move to a LAUNDRY  LINE. BOXERS hang from t Bennie This Lev guy is a little off. On the computer board, a small RED LIGHT replaces the GRE LIGHT. Then another.  No one notices.

head_text.subj: CAMERA FOLLOWS MICROSCOPIC AEROSOL BUBBLES OF LIQUID OXYG

text: (MACRO SHOT)
DRIPPING from a valve onto a COMPUTER CIRCUIT BOARD.
THE GAUGE STARTS TO rise. A.J. WATCHES. One hundred eight five...190...195...
(into intercom) Lev, the pressure's climbing.
(EXTREME MACRO)
The Liquid Oxygen oozes into the circuit board. Surgeon-l microscopic camera tracks it under the keys, reaching a C SWITCH. It  SPARKS.

Lev, Sharp, and Chick are walking toward the shuttles. Th ELECTRICITY in the  MIR FLUTTERS. Lev stops. Sharp stops. looks over his shoulder toward the  central hub. A chill down his spine. DOLLY INTO LEV'S EYES -  Lev  (whispering) Leak. Run. Lev and Sharp run toward the central hub. Lev punches a K Lev  (cont'd)
Chick takes off running past Lev and Sharp. Sharp  (to Chick) E-vac. E-vac. Unhook the shuttles. Move!
A.J. reacts to the KLAXON, starts to climb up the shaft l A.J. struggles  under the heavy weight of his cold suit, reaching ---
Circuits pop VIOLENTLY all around A.J., as the mixture of chemical in the air  starts to CHEW the MIR's walls.

Lev, Sharp, and Chick RUN into the hub as the leak contin growing rapidly  worse, EATING the walls. Sharp sees the Runs back toward the docking port.  Lev  (to Sharp) Seal door. As Sharp SEALS the hatch, Lev returns to look for A.J.
Harry and Chick react to the KLAXOX BLARES. Harry Unhook the shuttles. Harry and Chick RUN out of the rear module and race throu maze of twisting  corridors.
A.J. runs through another corridor, heading for the docki as the walls  around him POP! Lev files around the corner smashing into A.J.
The smoking circuitry SPARKS, and the REAR MODULE explode VIOLENT  CONCUSSION, LAUNCHING A LONG TONGUE OF FLAME int
Harry and Chick race for the DOCKING MODULE as -- BEHIND SECOND MODULE  fills with FIRE and EXPLODES, rocking the Then a third. Fire starts to RIP  THROUGH corridors in th
The MIR shudders and begins to TILT TO ONE SIDE.
Everything is SIDEWAYS. Lev is KNOCKED to the ground. A H COMPUTER BOARD  falls, separating A.J. and Lev. Attempting to reach A.J., Lev turns back and runs from wh just came.
A.J. looks left, then right. He doesn't know how to get t docking port. He  starts running.
Sharp re-joins Bennie and Truman. They unhook the FUEL LI the shuttles.  Sharp and Chick run aboard Shuttle Freedom boards Independence.
A.J. is at the corridor fork. Right or left? The Russian above both  paths doesn't help. Just as he's about to go Lev suddenly appears, grabs  A.J., and PUSHES HIM into th
Lev Run Yankee!

Sharp  (to Watts as he sits and buckles up) Shut the doors and fire her up! Watts We still have people out there. Sharp It's them or ALL OF US. CLOSE THE DOORS NOW! As the doors are closing, Harry and Chick rush into Shutt Freedom. Harry's  fingers grab the doors just in time. Th retract back.  Harry Did A.J. make it? Chick I didn't see him.
Truman buckles himself in, fires up the Independence.
Freedom is fired up. The MIR shudders again. TILTS furthe Sharp We have to GO!
A.J. and Lev are running hard as DEBRIS falls behind them walls start to  TEAR APART. They turn a corner, headed to docking port --
Harry is at the door, eyes frantically searching for A.J. Sharp WE GO NOW! Sharp stabs a button on his pilot console. The AUTOMATED BEGIN to slide  shut.
Truman stabs a button on his pilot console. The AUTOMATED BEGIN to slide  shut.
A.J. and Lev race into the docking port from a rear corri Harry sees them.  Lev dives into Independence just as the close. A.J. dives head-long  through the shutting Indepen doors.
Sharp  (to Watts) Full thrusters!

The two shuttles RELEASE AWAY from the MIR Station on FUL THRUSTER POWER, just  escaping as -- THE MIR STATION EXPLODES in an eternal flash fire, blowin sections of wall  panels and sending a SOLAR PANEL shooti toward Freedom that just misses her!  The collapsed MIR S drifts off into the oblivion of space.
A.J. sits panting on the floor of the shuttle next to the port door. Lev  stares down at him. Lev I am Cosmonaut Lev Andropov, what your name? A.J. My name is A.J. Lev You just blew up my home.
Golden and Sharp sitting around going over data. New imag the closer,  meaner asteroid approaching.

Interior small sleeping area. Max hanging upside-down in gravity. Wakes up  yawning. He looks to Bear. Max Oh, man, did I have a dream. Bear So did Martin Luthor King. Max No, this was a bad dream. We were drilling and the gr the bit.  Then it ate the pipe, then the derrick. Then it Bear That's a dumb-ass dream. Max I'm not coming home. They look at each other.

Harry, Bear, Chick, and Sharp stand looking out the cockp window toward  the brilliant blue Earth. Bear What are you thinking about, Chick? Chick My kid. You. Bear My Mom, she'd be proud to see me as an astronaut. Chick Harry, what are you thinking? Harry  (looking at Earth) How beautiful it is. Thinkin' about all that oil I  sucke and spit into the air.Funny how a man can live 46 years a realize  he ain't been doing the right thing.

BEHIND A CURTAIN - Golden confers with Collinswood. Collinswood The President is counting on you to put out t Dan. Say  whatever you have to. Just do it. Golden walks from behind the curtain. Walks up to the pod VIDEO CAMERAS  swivel into position. For a long moment Golden just stands there, saying nothin Golden I work for the President of the United States.  (long pause; looks over  at Collinswood) But I think it's my duty as a scientist to tell the world is happening. Three,  days ago a manned space mission was intercept an asteroid  which has entered the Earth's orbi (REPORTERS all chatter) This is a difficult  mission. In all  frankness, it is th difficult mission anyone has ever flown.   (beat) A little over fifty years ago we sent our Armed Forces ha around  the world to save the  world from an evil empire threatened mass extinction. The men  and women of this na united, answered the calland preserved our freedom.   (beat) Once again  we face a threat to our way of life. And once we look to our  military to preserve our future. The men women selected to lead this mission  are America's  fines most decorated career officers in the military. Our  hope prayers are with them. Thank you.  Golden walks off. The REPORTERS CLAMOR Reporters  (UNISON)
Director Golden! DIRECTOR GOLDEN! BACKSTAGE - Golden approaches Collinswood. Collinswood Golden, your drillers better not let us down. Golden We'll do your best.

The two Shuttles approach THE MOON, Freedom in the lead,  Independence following. Beyond the Moon, too distant to see clearly, THE ASTEROID its trajectory  toward Earth. It is a HUGE, GRAGGY MASS  surrounded on all sides by a DEBRIS  CLUSTER of rock and ice glinting on and off in reflected sunlight, like  mill fireflies.
Watts  (unbelieving) My goodness, look at that thing.... Sharp We have visual of target, Houston. Velocity thirty- hundred miles  an hour.
Clark sits with Techs Flip and Skip. Golden and Temple pa behind the console.
Harry, Chick, Bear, and Max finish buckling into their se restraints and  harnesses.
A.J., Lev, Bennie, Jimbo and Tito buckle on harnesses. Be looks at A.J.  nervously.
The Shuttles rapidly close on the moon. The dead, luminou looms larger  in frame.

THE LUNAR SURFACE completely fills the cockpit windshield lost sight of  the oncoming asteroid. Sharp Visual contact with target lost, Houston. IN THE REAR CABIN - Harry, Chick, Bear, and Max stare in the  ever-approaching Moon.
Shuttles Freedom and Independence shoot toward the Moon, by the lunar  gravitational field.
THROUGH THE WINDSHIELD - THE LUNAR SURFACE is only 150 mi down, looking close  enough to reach down and touch.
The two Shuttles whip into lunar orbit, moving around the continuing to  accelerate, nearing its Dark side.
Clark  (into headset) How we doin', Freedom, over?
Watts Nearing the Dark Side, Houston, a minute thirty and counting.

location: THE OTHER SIDE OF THE MOON

text: On the Moon's opposite side, THE ASTEROID roars into fram trailing  fragments motionless in relation to each other, travelling as a swarm, a cluster  of debris. As it nears Moon's gravitational field --  TRAILING FRAGMENTS peel away, drawn into the Moon by its gravity. A  relatively DEBRIS-LESS CORRIDOR begins to for side of the asteroid.
Skip Twenty seconds till we lose radio contact, Director. Clark You're on your own, Willie. You've got to raise you velocity 17  thousand miles an hour or you won't catch th target, over.
Sharp See you on the other side, Houston. Skip  (V.O)
Entering Dark Side, Freedom, and counting: ten, nine, eig seven...

Skip Radio contact terminated. The radio crackles with STATIC. ON THE TECHNICIAN'S CONSO of Freedom's  and Independence's COMPUTERIZED SYSTEM MONI (pressurization, oxygen,  electrical power, fuel capacity

Golden They'll be pullin' nine and half G's for eleven mi General. Temple Anyone done that before? Flip Yeah. That Russian monkey in 1957. Clark We'll pick 'em up again in sixteen minutes, Danny. Golden If they're still alive.

The radio is STATIC. Watts Rockets ready for burn, Willie. Sharp  (over shoulder to Harry and others) Time to suck it up, people. Just  pretend you're on the b roller coaster at Disneyland... (mumbles under breath) ...times a  hundred....  Sharp reaches for the BOOSTER ROCKET SWITCH. He gives Wat last look, then  throws the switch.
Freedom and Independence fire their BOOSTERS. The two SHU explode forward,  hurtling around the Moon's DARK SIDE wi degree of increasing velocity never  before experienced b

Harry, Chick, Bear, and Max get hit with the first G-Forc Their torsos press  back against their seats. They flex t arms, breathing deeply, expanding  their chest cavities a were taught in training.  Harry I hate to fly, I hate to fly, I hate to fly....
A.J., Lev, Bennie, Jimbo, and Tito get slammed back by th wave of  G-Forces.
Watts reads her VELOCITY INDICATOR under G-Forces so bad speaks through  clenched teeth Watts Fourteen thousand....sixteen thousand...twenty thou miles an hour,  Willie...!
Silence. Tension. Technicians stare at their consoles. Clark They're hittin' the big G's right about...now. Golden Come on, Willie, you can do this....

Excruciating, gut-wrenching, turn-your-intestines-inside- Forces. HARRY and  CHICK'S FACIAL MUSCLES distort hideous their rubbery cheeks and lips flatten  out. They continue exercises, tensing every muscle, trying to keep blood  fl evenly distributed.
A.J. and Bennie's distorted faces, likewise, go through t G-Force  exercises, tensing every muscle.

IN ONE AWE-INSPIRING SHOT, we see --  Shuttles Freedom and Independence rocketing around the Mo darkness, further  and further, until finally WE SEE,  increasingly, a staggering, mind blowing  visual --  THE ASTEROID'S TRAILING DEBRIS appears, a HUGE CLOUD of t CHUNKS AND  PEBBLES, and much larger BOULDERS, and ICEBER size of houses, the ice  glinting with reflected sunlight throwing off a dazzling SPECTRAL SHOWER OF  LIGHT in all  directions, and finally --  THE ASTEROID'S HUGE CORE - it has just cleared the Moon a flies straight  for it's destination - the cool, blue PLA EARTH dead ahead across an expanse  of space.  Shuttles Freedom and Independence slingshot out of the Lu orbit and fall in  behind the asteroid, settling into the

Continued STATIC on the radio. Everyone sits nervously wa Suddenly the  shuttles' computerised SYSTEM MONITORS begi click back on.  Clark Freedom, come in, over. Independence, come in, over Nothing. Golden grabs the mike. Golden Willie? Come in, over. Willie, can you hear me...? Total silence. A pin could drop. The N.A.S.A. Technicians nervously at the  Central Board.  Then, suddenly through static Sharp  (V.0)
Houston, you gotta see this to believe it....  Elation. Held breaths are exhaled. Golden and N.A.S.A.  TECHNICIANS smile. No one  is more relieved than Grace.

No visibility here either. Ice chunks and pebbles BANG ag the windshield.  Truman I've got no visibility. I've lost orientation to t target!  Suddenly, as sudden as it came, the debris clears.  But a HUGE ICE BOULDER the size of a three-story building into  Independence's path. It hits a BOULDER which collid another.  Truman Big guy! Dead ahead! Freedom goes left, Independence right, splitting the ice Freedom clears the ice boulder by a foot. Independence, n lucky, clips the  ice boulder, ripping her left thruster off. With one thruster,  Independence careens out of cont twirling and spinning.

The fuselage is spinning. A.J., Bennie and the others are terror. In the  cockpit, Truman SCREAMS over the radio Truman Houston, MAYDAY, MAYDAY, we're going down!  The Shuttle's roof collides with a rock. We hear SCRAPING The CEILING  dents in, dislodging INTERIOR CEILING PANELS with wires and electrical  components; they rain down on the others.  Choas. The SPARKING CABIN fills with smoke.  Truman Crew, go to life support!  Everyone grabs for their HELMET, frantically trying to ge on. A.J. gets  his on, but he can't lock his neck seal. H fidgets with the little SEAKL LOCKS.  A.J. rips off the helmet. It slips from his fingers and f off through the  zero-g cabin!  A.J. Goddamn it!  A.J. throws off his seat harnesses and goes after his hel zero-gravity,  the sides of the twirling cockpit revolve A.J. as he moves.

Firmly.  Harry Great. Glad we have that understanding.  Golden  (V.O.)

IF you're gonna pull this off, we have to have a little t about time...and temperature. Zero Barrier's in two hours Harry Wait...wait..what about temperature? When did tempe come into the  picture?  Golden  (V.O.)

We didn't anticipate you being on the asteroid so long. T clock is ticking...  Harry How hot is it going to get?!  Golden  (V.O.)
Three hundred and fifty degrees.  Harry's face drops.  Harry Thanks for telling us now, Golden....I don't think can handle  those kind of temperatures....

Harry clicks off the radio.  Watts We've still gotta fix this shuttle, Stamper.  Harry Give me some more good news. You've got two new ass who can fix  your shuttle. Bear, Max, hop to it. There's machine they can't fix. We can  handle the hole from here

A.J. Over the hill. Suddenly, the ground under the vehicle shakes sharply. A. the Armadillo. The ground around the vehicle heaves up and down. The GRO SPLITS. One  TECTONIC PLATE rises 15 feet in the air. The breaks like a wave, up and  down.

(firm) We're gona do this, then we're going home.  Lev I l-o-v-e this American confidence! Like John Wayne.  (sotto) This why I  suspect you won Cold War.  A.J. Hep me get these rocks over there.
